text: Suppose you have given a set S = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6}. Let R be an equivalence relation with 3 equivalence class, then which of the following statement is/are true? (a) Minimum cardinality of R is 14. (b) Maximum cardinality of R is 18. (c) Total number of equivalence relation on S with three equivalence class is 90. (d) There exists only one relation on S, which is equivalence and partial order simultaneously.
